text:
@SpeakerPelosi The original sins were the @CDCgov developing a faulty test and the @US_FDA dragging its feet on allowing states to rely on private tests, neither of which Trump had anything to do with. Also, was Trump was working, Pelosi was trying to impeach him. 
https://t.co/jsLxauRF1i
